thumb.title: Super Metroid Grand Prix - Any% IGT TAS in 2:50 by Sniq, Nymx, ED
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XilimIG6Avs以下説明文Cool short hack that I decided to TAS. Record for this used to be 2:53 by Saturn since 2009 until Nymx & ED improved it down to 2:52.I Used their inputs as base, which I managed to improve down to 2:50 (2:50.59F to be more specific)Ball pump & slopekiller techniques are very useful for this hack. Rules:-In-Game Time optimized-No pausingFrames: 15252Rerecord count: 6925自分でやってみたsm45226865
